```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
library(datasets)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_gray()) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = lifeExp, size = pop)) +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  scale_x_log10()
```


```{r}
airquality %>% tidyr::gather("id", "value", 1:4) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Day,y=value, col = id)) +
    geom_line() +
    geom_point(na.rm = T)+
    facet_wrap(id ~ Month) 

```
